channel.title: mycatalog updates
channel.description: 'My Catalog' uses the IBM Cloud catalog API to retrieve data from the catalog. It attempts to be as accurate as possible. This feed shows additions, updates, removals from the catalog. Use with care. It is a work-in-progress :)

item.title: [updated] Databases for MongoDB (databases-for-mongodb) has a new plan named standard-gen2
[updated] Databases for PostgreSQL (databases-for-postgresql) has a new plan named standard-gen2
[updated] Event Streams (messagehub) has a new plan named enterprise-gen2
item.description: Event Streams Gen 2 Enterprise Plan delivers Apache Kafka on a single-tenant virtual machine, fully deployed on VPC, providing hypervisor-level isolation and dedicated storage bandwidth.

item.title: [updated] Key Protect (kms) has changed the description of the plan named tiered-pricing
item.description:
*before*: Key versions are created whenever a key is created or imported, and whenever an existing key is rotated. A key that has been rotated five times, for example, has six versions (five versions created by rotations plus the initial version).
This plan does not offer cross-regional resiliency.
, *after*: Key versions are created whenever a key is created or imported, and whenever an existing key is rotated. A key that has been rotated five times, for example, has six versions (five versions created by rotations plus the initial version).
This plan does not offer cross-regional resiliency.
